author: ETA PRIME
description:
The brand-new Anbernic DS is finally here, and this is the lowest-cost dual-screen handheld we’ve ever seen hit the market! Today I’m giving you my first look after spending about 12 hours with it — and honestly, this thing nails the classic Nintendo DSi XL feel while still being a modern Android handheld with dual touchscreens.
The Anbernic DS uses two identical 4-inch IPS displays, a super-solid hinge design, dual analog sticks, front-facing speakers, Android 14, and a quad-core RK3568 CPU. It’s not the most powerful dual-screen device ever, but for DS, GBA, PSP, N64 and other retro emulation… it’s actually really impressive.
Buy it Here: https://anbernic.com/products/rgds?sca_ref=2193181.CeT6UNbFuN
